channel.title: Heres what im looking for, please try help if possible!
channel.description:
Ok what it is...
Im kinda new to coding, i want to learn but i dont want it to be via a leeched buggy source etc, so what im after is a good base (not old style gameframe) with just most skills and all basics like combat, walking, running, talking, etc etc... but NO custom items etc.
Can anyone suggest to me where i can find a good base to start with please? :)
Many thanks :)

item.title: Heres what im looking for, please try help if possible!
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

id read some java tutorial’s etc before starting a private server project, id recomend starting on a Project Insanity Base or something along the lines of that, everything you find will be buggy because no ones going to release hard work. but thats the point of javascript you start and you code till its to your likeing.

I hope i helped you out a little bit in the decision you make.

Read full topic
item.source: Heres what im looking for, please try help if possible!

item.title: Heres what im looking for, please try help if possible!
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin1160 Benjamin1160
item.description:
@Benjamin1160 wrote:

Tbh You need to find a source that fits to your needs. Finding a “blank” source is very hard to come around by. So find a source to your liking and clear it out or if you are lucky you will find a blank one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ImmensePK wrote:

t4:

if you’re trying to learn to program, i’d suggest steering clear of RSPS.

I guess i phrased it wrong, i mean i want to learn to code an RSPS just as a hobby, for something to do in spare time
